titles: Augsburg Edges Schalke 04 in Thrilling Match!

captions.text: Augsburg's thrilling win over Schalke 04! Don't miss the highlights!
Schalke 04 falls to Augsburg in a nail-biter! Watch now!
Augsburg edges Schalke 04 in a closely contested match

summary: Augsburg secured a thrilling 2-1 win over Schalke 04 in their 2015/2016 Bundesliga match. The home team took the lead with Jeong-Ho Hong's goal in the 33rd minute, but Schalke 04 equalized through Sead Kolašinac's shot in the 69th minute. Caiuby Francisco da Silva sealed the win for Augsburg with a goal in the 91st minute.

key_moments.description: Augsburg takes the lead with Jeong-Ho Hong's goal
Schalke 04 equalizes with Sead Kolašinac's shot
Augsburg seals the win with Caiuby Francisco da Silva's goal
